channel.title: The VCA Sessions Podcast
channel.description:
UK based transmission featuring guest DJs, composers & producers unleashing their skills & influences to deliver diverse snapshots of melody & rhythm with no restraints on style, form or content. From cerebral, chilled soundscapes to beat driven dancefloor assaults - the VCA Sessions will take you somewhere new.
Check the Aural Dynamics 'Output Update' feed for detailed information about each new VCA Session.
channel.copyright: ℗ & © Copyright Aural Dynamics 2007-2012. All rights reserved
channel.itunes:subtitle: The VCA Sessions
channel.itunes:author: Aural Dynamics
channel.itunes:summary:
UK based transmission featuring guest DJs, composers & producers unleashing their skills & influences to deliver diverse snapshots of melody & rhythm with no restraints on style, form or content. From cerebral, chilled soundscapes to beat driven dancefloor assaults - the VCA Sessions will take you somewhere new.
Each pre-recorded session ranges features fresh material by published & unpublished artists.
Check the Aural Dynamics 'Output Update' feed for detailed information about each new VCA Session.

item.title: VCA Session 26: New Moon
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: VCA Session 26: New Moon
item.itunes:summary: Another set from the moon men captures an epic live performance unleashing a wash of psychedelic drones and swirling feedback at the Festival Of Noise event in Cambridge in April 2012.
item.description: Another set from the moon men captures an epic live performance unleashing a wash of psychedelic drones and swirling feedback at the Festival Of Noise event in Cambridge in April 2012.

item.title: VCA Session 25: Sketches
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: VCA Session 25: Sketches
item.itunes:summary: This set offers audio sketches made by cjmann in a single session on the 18th February 2012. The raw materials include kalimba, harmonica, whistle and voice which have been subjected to heavy duty processing.
item.description: This set offers audio sketches made by cjmann in a single session on the 18th February 2012. The raw materials include kalimba, harmonica, whistle and voice which have been subjected to heavy duty processing.

item.title: VCA Session 24: Made For Me - Given To You
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: VCA Session 24: Made For Me - Given To You
item.itunes:summary: This session features a collage of cello, vocal, percussion, piano and field recordings morphing through a number of discreet changes, from chamber ritual through to blissed out drum frenzy...
item.description: This session features a collage of cello, vocal, percussion, piano and field recordings morphing through a number of discreet changes, from chamber ritual through to blissed out drum frenzy...

item.title: VCA Session 23: Base Create
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: VCA Session 23: Base Create
item.itunes:summary: Base Create promises more noise shrouded delights from cjmann including a remix of Wrong Planets "Punk Espanya", new tracks from tEdor, Cultivater, House Grinder and a previously unreleased 'Blue' track "Prisoner".
item.description: Base Create promises more noise shrouded delights from cjmann including a remix of Wrong Planets "Punk Espanya", new tracks from tEdor, Cultivater, House Grinder and a previously unreleased 'Blue' track "Prisoner".

item.title: VCA Session 22: Strained Perception Part 1
item.itunes:author: Abel Mortis
item.itunes:subtitle: VCA Session 22: Strained Perception Part 1
item.itunes:summary: Abel Mortis takes listeners on an ecclectic voyage spanning the realms of pop and post punk from decades past. Including iconic classics from Bauhaus, Tubeway Army, Dukes of Stratosphere, Siouxsie and Prince!
item.description: Abel Mortis takes listeners on an ecclectic voyage spanning the realms of pop and post punk from decades past. Including iconic classics from Bauhaus, Tubeway Army, Dukes of Stratosphere, Siouxsie and Prince!

item.title: VCA Session 21: Shadows in a Basement Part 5
item.itunes:author: The Filigree Society
item.itunes:subtitle: Shadows in a Basement Part 5
item.itunes:summary: Shadows in a Basement Part 5 presents a live set of subtle, atmospheric textures from Ypsmael. Recorded at the first gathering of The Filigree Society in Cambridge, March 2011.
item.description: Shadows in a Basement Part 5 presents a live set of subtle, atmospheric textures from Ypsmael. Recorded at the first gathering of The Filigree Society in Cambridge, March 2011.

item.title: VCA Session 20: Shadows in a Basement Part 4
item.itunes:author: The Filigree Society
item.itunes:subtitle: Shadows in a Basement Part 4
item.itunes:summary: The fourth instalment of recorded performances from The Filigree Society music event. Presenting a brief but memorable live performance of improvised material from cjmann.
item.description: The fourth instalment of recorded performances from The Filigree Society music event. Presenting a brief but memorable live performance of improvised material from cjmann.

item.title: VCA Session 19: Pozitive-Negative
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: Pozitive-Negative
item.itunes:summary: Another Prodcast is re-channelled to deliver a wide variety of delights including big band pozitive vibes from Trio Pozitive, the latest signal from Idiot Trench, live music from Wrong Planet and and a track from tEdor.
item.description: Another Prodcast is re-channelled to deliver a wide variety of delights including big band pozitive vibes from Trio Pozitive, the latest signal from Idiot Trench, live music from Wrong Planet and and a lovely track from tEdor.

item.title: VCA Session 18: Shadows in a Basement Part 3
item.itunes:author: The Filigree Society
item.itunes:subtitle: Shadows in a Basement Part 3
item.itunes:summary: The third instalment of recorded performances from The Filigree Society music event. BUTTONMOON entertain the audience with wondrous dronesome melodies from the outer rim and beyond.
item.description: The third instalment of recorded performances from The Filigree Society music event. BUTTONMOON entertain the audience with wondrous dronesome melodies from the outer rim.

item.title: VCA Session 17: Poptones
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: Poptones
item.itunes:summary: Featuring poptastic sounds ranging Kelvox1's Stephen via the black is black desolation of mix of Sol-de-muerte's Let Me show you the way, to the ambient pop of cjmann's remix of Wrong Planet's Vulnerable, demos from BUTTONMOON, a fried track from cjmann, plus archive acid from House Grinder circa 1994!
item.description: Featuring poptastic sounds ranging Kelvox1's Stephen via the black is black desolation of mix of Sol-de-muerte's Let Me show you the way, to the ambient pop of cjmann's remix of Wrong Planets Vulnerable, demos from BUTTONMOON, a fried track from cjmann, plus archive acid from House Grinder circa 1994!

item.title: VCA Session 16: Shadows in a Basement Part 2
item.itunes:author: The Filigree Society
item.itunes:subtitle: Shadows in a Basement Part 2
item.itunes:summary: The second instalment of live recordings from the The Filigree Society features Abel Mortis weaving together a set of pre-recorded material with live electronic percussion and melodic textures.
item.description: The second instalment of live recordings from the The Filigree Society features Abel Mortis weaving together a set of pre-recorded material with live electronic percussion and melodic textures.

item.title: VCA Session 15: Shadows in a Basement Part 1
item.itunes:author: The Filigree Society
item.itunes:subtitle: Shadows in a Basement Part 1
item.itunes:summary: The first instalment of selected live recordings from the The Filigree Society music event in Cambridge, March 2011 featuring a mindbending debut from Funf Durch Funf.
item.description: The first instalment of selected live recordings from the The Filigree Society music event in Cambridge, March 2011 featuring a mindbending debut from Funf Durch Funf.

item.title: VCA Session 14: Halicephalobus Mephisto
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: Halicephalobus Mephisto
item.itunes:summary: Halicephalobus Mephisto features new and exclusive tracks from the prods universe. Including new tracks from cjmann, Wild Flower and the soudtrack to Heirs of Confusion.
item.description: Halicephalobus Mephisto features new and exclusive tracks from the prods universe. Including new tracks from cjmann, Wild Flower and the soudtrack to Heirs of Confusion.

item.title: VCA Session 13: Communing
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: Communing
item.itunes:summary: Communing features a new exclusive tracks from Cultivater, Ypsmael, live tracks from Wrong Planet in acoustic mode and the Schmergmeister in full on feedback cacophony...
item.description: Communing features a new exclusive tracks from Cultivater, Ypsmael, live tracks from Wrong Planet in acoustic mode and the Schmergmeister in full on feedback cacophony...

item.title: VCA Session 12: New Shoot Growth
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: New Shoot Growth
item.itunes:summary: New Shoot Growth includes an excerpt from the soundtrack to a forthcoming Sol-de-muerte video, plus tracks from new Prods collaborators Ypsmael and Landscapes, along with a live psychedelic odyssey from Wrong Planet and an archive track by cjmann from 2007.
item.description: New Shoot Growth includes an excerpt from the soundtrack to a forthcoming Sol-de-muerte video, plus tracks from new Prods collaborators Ypsmael and Landscapes, along with a live psychedelic odyssey from Wrong Planet and an archive track by cjmann from 2007.

item.title: VCA Session 11: Arctic Diary
item.itunes:author: AcidIronKid
item.itunes:subtitle: Arctic Diary
item.itunes:summary: AcidIronKid of BUTTONMOON enters the studio to offer A polar landscape of downtempo tracks from around the World...
item.description: AcidIronKid of BUTTONMOON enters the studio to offer A polar landscape of downtempo tracks from around the World...

item.title: VCA Session 10: Lo Key Noise
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: Lo Key Noise
item.itunes:summary: Prods In The Dark 'main Mann' returns featuring material from March and April releases. Ranging from the alien soundscapes of Generic through to the warm words of Cultivater. and an exclusive preview of one of acidironkid's contributions to the ongoing Absolute Zero project.
item.description: Prods In The Dark 'main Mann' returns featuring material from March and April releases. Ranging from the alien soundscapes of Generic through to the warm words of Cultivater. and an exclusive preview of one of acidironkid's contributions to the ongoing Absolute Zero project.

item.title: VCA Session 09: Stormcloud Chamber
item.itunes:author: H-Tech
item.itunes:subtitle: Stormcloud Chamber
item.itunes:summary: H-Tech returns to guide the proceedings through a swirling dreamscape of tone and texture seamlessly fading together material from Lawrence English, KLF, Hammock, Loscil, Dick Mills and many others...
item.description: H-Tech returns to guide the proceedings through a swirling dreamscape of tone and texture seamlessly fading together material from Lawrence English, KLF, Hammock, Loscil, Dick Mills and many others...

item.title: VCA Session 08: 2010 Inner (Prodcast 2)
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: 2010 Inner
item.itunes:summary: CJMann takes the helm again to deliver an eclectic array of 2010 material from Prods In The Dark. Ranging from apocalyptic rock through industrial ambience to dark folk and noise.
item.description: CJMann takes the helm again to deliver an eclectic array of 2010 material from Prods In The Dark. Ranging from apocalyptic rock through industrial ambience to dark folk and noise.

item.title: VCA Session 07: 2010 Outer (Prodcast 1)
item.itunes:author: cjmann
item.itunes:subtitle: 2010 Outer
item.itunes:summary: A selection of tracks from audio and visual work produced during 2010 by cjmann.
item.description: A selection of tracks from audio and visual work produced during 2010 by cjmann.

item.title: VCA Session 06: Ambient Glitch
item.itunes:author: Ypsmael
item.itunes:subtitle: Ambient Glitch
item.itunes:summary: Ypsmael rolls out a blurry felt carpet of crackling ambient and drone textures, pierced by deep yellow rays of late afternoon light. Soon joined by the sound of hissing wind in the leaves and the smell of imminent cloudburst in the air under a murky canopy, as we start sliding down a long, steep gradient.
item.description: Ypsmael rolls out a blurry felt carpet of crackling ambient and drone textures, pierced by deep yellow rays of late afternoon light. Soon joined by the sound of hissing wind in the leaves and the smell of imminent cloudburst in the air under a murky canopy, as we start sliding down a long, steep gradient.

item.title: VCA Session 05: Chiptune
item.itunes:author: Xurba
item.itunes:subtitle: Chiptune
item.itunes:summary: Xurba sits in for his fifth VCA Session delivering a mammoth mix of underground retro styled electronica varying in pitch, pace and tone. Delighful, disturbing and genuinely odd... there's something for everyone here! Featuring tracks from Datasette, Trash 80, Eight Frozen Modules, Keith Le Blanc, Claro Intelecto, Vim!, Cornbeast and more.
item.description: Xurba sits in for his 4th VCA Session delivering a mammoth mix of underground retro styled electronica varying in pitch, pace and tone. Delighful, disturbing and genuinely odd... there's something for everyone here! Featuring tracks from Datasette, Trash 80, Eight Frozen Modules, Keith Le Blanc, Claro Intelecto, Vim!, Cornbeast and more.

item.title: VCA Session 04: H.O.T. Stuff
item.itunes:author: H-Tech
item.itunes:subtitle: H.O.T. Stuff
item.itunes:summary: Witness the subtle yet relentless techno rhythms of the H.O.T. sound seamlessly mixed together by skilled the hands of H-Tech.
item.description: Witness the subtle yet relentless techno rhythms of the H.O.T. sound seamlessly mixed together by skilled the hands of H-Tech.

item.title: VCA Session 03: Woozyphonics
item.itunes:author: Xurba
item.itunes:subtitle: Woozyphonics
item.itunes:summary: Back in the 1980s, when MP3 was a term for a small collective of English politicians, we used to listen to our music on vinyl discs with a central locating hole in the middle. Sometimes these holes were slightly off-centre, and this caused the pitch of the music to fluctuate slowly, simulating a doppler effect. These defective discs became very popular in certain musical circles, and were affectionately called 'woozyphons'. This mix is dedicated to the slightly off-centred and idiosyncratic music of our current demoscene artists.
item.description: Back in the 1980s, when MP3 was a term for a small collective of English politicians, we used to listen to our music on vinyl discs with a central locating hole in the middle. Sometimes these holes were slightly off-centre, and this caused the pitch of the music to fluctuate slowly, simulating a doppler effect. These defective discs became very popular in certain musical circles, and were affectionately called 'woozyphons'. This mix is dedicated to the slightly off-centred and idiosyncratic music of our current demoscene artists.

item.title: VCA Session 02: Industrial Strength
item.itunes:author: Xurba
item.itunes:subtitle: Industrial Strength
item.itunes:summary: Xurba is in the mix again for a drum and bass work out featuring tracks from various netlabel artists. Also watch out for the new Xurba LP out now on Kahvi Commercial.
item.description: Xurba is in the mix again for a drum and bass work out featuring tracks from various artists. Also watch out for the new Xurba LP out now on Kahvi Commercial.

item.title: VCA Session 01: Cognizant Revisitations
item.itunes:author: Xurba
item.itunes:subtitle: Cognizant Revisitations
item.itunes:summary: Xurba takes the studio hot seat for a lateral excursion into melodic, beat driven textures from electronic allies far & wide. This mix features a rich selection of quality output from independent artists and netlabels. Full track listing displays artist and label information. Don't miss out!
item.description: Xurba takes the studio hot seat for a lateral excursion into melodic, beat driven textures from electronic allies far & wide. This mix features a rich selection of quality output from independent artists and netlabels. Full track listing displays artist and label information. Don't miss out!

item.title: VCA Limited 00: Faded Secrets
item.itunes:author: Abel Mortis
item.itunes:subtitle: Faded Secrets
item.itunes:summary:
Abel Mortis presents first in a series of limited edition soundtrack montages compiled exclusively for the VCA Sessions. Using a provocative selection of motifs, samples and atmospherics Mortis aims to immerse the listener in a gothic dreamscape emerging somewhere between the writings of Edgar Allan Poe and the music of Tangerine Dream. The majority of content used was composed, produced and mixed by mortis with contributions from Spectral Cat, H-Tech, Oneman and Xurba.
'VCA Limited' mixes will be released at random intervals for a limited period only.
item.description: Abel Mortis presents first in a series of limited edition soundtrack montages compiled exclusively for the VCA Sessions. Using a provocative selection of motifs, samples and atmospherics Mortis aims to immerse the listener in a gothic dreamscape emerging somewhere between the writings of Edgar Allan Poe and the music of Tangerine Dream. The majority of content used was composed, produced and mixed by mortis with contributions from Spectral Cat, H-Tech Oneman and Xurba. 'VCA Limited' mixes will be released at random intervals for a limited period only.

item.title: VCA Session 00: Test Transmission
item.itunes:author: The Q Lab
item.itunes:subtitle: Aural Dynamics is transmitting!
item.itunes:summary:
Aural Dynamics has breached this soundfield! You are recieving a test signal transmitted from The Q Lab.
Bookmark this Podcast for future intsalments of audiocentric adventures delivered by guest DJs applying their skills. Each pre-recorded show will range from 45-90 minutes in duration featuring a wealth of 'pod safe' content by established + unpublished artists. All sessions will be transmitted in MP3 format.
Check the Aural Dynamics 'Output Update' feed for detailed information about each new VCA Session.
item.description: Aural Dynamics has breached this soundfield! You are recieving a test signal transmitted from The Q Lab. Bookmark this Podcast for future intsalments of audiocentric adventures delivered by guest DJs applying their skills. Each pre-recorded show will range from 45-90 minutes in duration featuring a wealth of 'pod safe' content by established + unpublished artists. All sessions will be trannsmitted in MP3 format. Check the Aural Dynamics 'Output Update' feed for detailed information about each new VCA Session.
